Plot: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.
Title: Ghost Rider
Writer: Mark Steven Johnson (screenplay), Mark Steven Johnson (screen story)
Actors: Matt Long, Raquel Alessi, Brett Cullen, Peter Fonda
tomatoConsensus: Ghost Rider is a sour mix of morose, glum histrionics amidst jokey puns and hammy dialogue.
